author: wsmoak
msg: Add a method to verify the new User Roles page (for CONTINUUM-1166).

author: kaushalye
msg: This is a major change in the configurations in Rampart/C. Now the configurations are based on WS-Security Policy specification 1.1 -July 2005. There are samples available under rampart/samples/secpolicy. These samples are to cover all the scenarios that Rampart/C is supporting up to now.
